CONCLUSIONS: Our results support the hypothesis that @CHEMICAL_aliskiren @CHEMICAL_MESH:C446481 @@@aliskiren@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ as indicated by improved HOMA-IR in @GENE_CAV1 @GENE_12389 @@@cav-1@@@ KO @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment resulted in changes consistent with increased @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.
